org.opendaylight.controller.protocol_plugin.openflow.internal

Class OFStatisticsManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opendaylight.controller.protocol_plugin.openflow.internal.OFStatisticsManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CommandProvider, IInventoryShimExternalListener, IInventoryShimInternalListener, IOFStatisticsManager

    public class OFStatisticsManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements IOFStatisticsManager, IInventoryShimExternalListener, CommandProvider
    Periodically polls the different OF statistics from the OF switches, caches them, and publishes results towards SAL. It also provides an API to directly query the switch for any specific statistics.

      • getOFFlowStatistics

        public java.util.List<org.openflow.protocol.statistics.OFStatistics> getOFFlowStatistics(java.lang.Long switchId,
                                                                                org.openflow.protocol.OFMatch ofMatch,
                                                                                short priority)
        Description copied from interface: IOFStatisticsManager
        Return all the statistics for all the flows present on the specified switch
        Specified by:
        getOFFlowStatistics in interface IOFStatisticsManager
        Parameters:
        switchId - the openflow datapath id
        ofMatch - the openflow match to query. If null, the query is intended for all the flows
        priority - Priority of the wanted flow
        Returns:
        the list of openflow statistics

      • queryStatistics

        public java.util.List<org.openflow.protocol.statistics.OFStatistics> queryStatistics(java.lang.Long switchId,
                                                                            org.openflow.protocol.statistics.OFStatisticsType statType,
                                                                            java.lang.Object target)
        Description copied from interface: IOFStatisticsManager
        Send a statistics request message to the specified switch and returns the switch response. It blocks the caller until the response has arrived from the switch or the request has timed out
        Specified by:
        queryStatistics in interface IOFStatisticsManager
        Parameters:
        switchId - the openflow datapath id of the target switch
        statType - the openflow statistics type
        target - the target object. For flow statistics it is the OFMatch. For port statistics, it is the port id. If null the query will be performed for all the targets for the specified statistics type.
        Returns:
        the list of openflow statistics
